generalInfo: Avoid use during pregnancy unless clearly necessary.

renalImpairment.specificInfo: Dose adjustment is required in renal impairment based on creatinine clearance.

sideEffects.specificInfo: Common: Dizziness; Drowsiness (somnolence); Increased appetite; Weight gain; Feeling different; Confusion; Memory impairment (amnesia); Tremor; Dry mouth; Constipation; Nausea; Asthenia (general weakness); vision disorder; Lethargy; Arthralgia; headache; insomnia. Uncommon: Peripheral edema (swelling of hands and feet); Depression; Agitation; Anorgasmia; Myoclonus (muscle jerks); hyperaesthesia; Tachycardia; Hypoglycaemia; Flushing; Rash; myalgia; ; Urinary incontinence; Dysuria; Neutropenia; Hypotension; Hypertension; anxiety. Rare: Pancreatitis; Dysphagia; Oliguria; Rhabdomyolysis; Suicidal behavior; Stevens-Johnson syndrome; Vision loss.

dosages.doseInfo: up to 600 mg daily in 3 divided doses
